It depends on the context of the NTR tag, I didn't read this, so I don't know about this one in particular. There are some "NTR" that I do believe are good, but I hate the slutty stay at home mom cliche. I don't like NTR as a way of someone wrecking a normal relationship (It's not my cup of tea, enjoy it if you want to) but there are 1 or 2 NTR things I've read where the husband is an abusive piece of shit and the wife turns to someone who she learns she loves more than her husband, eventually leaving him. <- - - - This is the only type of NTR I like.
